articles.author: Bob Chipman
articles.title: Scoob! Review – Escape to the Movies - The Escapist
articles.content:
Escapist film critic Bob Chipman calls Scoob! the best movie for 8-year-olds anyone has ever tried to make entirely out of pop culture references for 45-year-olds.
This is Escape to the Movies, talking about Scoob!, a big-budget Scooby-Doo effort.
